snippet.title: New Releases Help Video Game Investors Stay Upbeat
snippet.description:
New Releases Help Video Game Investors Stay Upbeat
By Andrea Tse 10:17 AM EDT 05/13/13
Despite uncertainties about the next generation of gaming consoles, game publisher revenues continue to rise. Take-Two reports Monday after EA and Activision Blizzard's earnings last week.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/11921161/1/new-releases-help-video-game-investors-stay-upbeat.html

snippet.title: Market Preview: Flipping the Script
snippet.description:
Market Preview: Flipping the Script
By Michael Baron 10:15 PM EST 02/01/12
The worst stocks of 2011 were the best ones in January, a fact that doesn't bode all that well for this rally.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/11395115/1/market-preview-flipping-the-script.html
